class.name: OpenXRSpatialComponentPlaneSemanticLabelList
class.brief_description: Object for storing the queries plane semantic label result data.

method.name: get_plane_semantic_label
method.description: Returns the plane semantic label for the parent entity at this [param index].

constants.constant: Plane represents the surface of a table.
